Leluthia mexicana Cameron, 1887
, designated by Viereck (1914) .

This widely distributed genus consist of two subgenera,
Euhecabolodes Tobias, 1962
and
Leluthia
s. str. Species of
Leluthia
were recently recorded in the fauna of Afrotropical region for the first time by Belokobylskij (2020b) .
Afrotropical, Australasian, Nearctic, Neotropical and Palaearctic regions.
